entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
